title: Spear

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You're literally a spear.
- You're so literally a spear that you're not a player.
- Instead, you're an item. You start in the middle of the town, magically hiding from all.
- If you're in the middle of the town, the first player to cast a vote for a player picks you up. They get you.
- When a player has you, you are let into their private channel.
- They may, as a night action, use you to deal an attack. To do this, they choose a player.
- Once your holder chooses a target, you may choose up to one of that target's living neighbours. Your holder will use you to deal a Powerful attack to their target and the neighbour you chose. If you didn't choose a neighbour, your holder will only attack their target, but it will ignore all protective effects.
- Once you're used, you magically return to the middle of the town. Your previous holder may never pick you up again.

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value:
- If your holder dies before using you, their killer gets you. If they were hanged or otherwise didn't really have a killer, you magically return to the middle of the town.
- You may still talk in day chat because I said so.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be used to kill three players.
